definition: A movable barrier that is typically made of wood or metal, used to close off an entrance or exit to a building or room. It is commonly found in residential and commercial spaces, serving as a means of privacy, security, and separation between different areas.

examples.german: Klopf an die Tür, bevor du reinkommst.
examples.english: Knock on the door before you come in.
The door is made of wood.
